name: firefox-tab-suspender
description: A Firefox extension that automatic suspend tabs and saves memory

scripts._build_c:dev: emcc src/main/background/c/main.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/services/array_service/array_service.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/vector.c src/main/background/c/core/providers/javascript_functions_provider/javascript_functions_provider.c src/main/background/c/core/services/event_loop_service/event_loop_service.c src/main/background/c/core/services/events_service/events_service.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_1d_action/push_event_1d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_action/push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/wasm_initialization_action/wasm_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/tabs_initialization_action/tabs_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/is_able_to_push_event_action/is_able_to_push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_2d_action/push_event_2d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/tabs_repository/tabs_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/settings_repository/settings_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/cache_repository/cache_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/windows_repository/windows_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/settings/settings.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/cache/cache.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/tab/tab.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/event/event.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/window/window.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/cache_data_source/cache_data_source.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/settings_data_source/settings_data_source.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=10 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o src/main/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='[\"cwrap\"]' --js-library src/main/background/js/Library.js -s DEMANGLE_SUPPORT=1 -frtti -g4 --source-map-base ./dev/service.wasm.map -s ASSERTIONS=2
scripts._build_c:dist: emcc -O2 src/main/background/c/main.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/services/array_service/array_service.c src/main/background/c/infrastructure/libs/vector/vector.c src/main/background/c/core/providers/javascript_functions_provider/javascript_functions_provider.c src/main/background/c/core/services/event_loop_service/event_loop_service.c src/main/background/c/core/services/events_service/events_service.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_1d_action/push_event_1d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_action/push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/wasm_initialization_action/wasm_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/tabs_initialization_action/tabs_initialization_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/is_able_to_push_event_action/is_able_to_push_event_action.c src/main/background/c/core/actions/push_event_2d_action/push_event_2d_action.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/tabs_repository/tabs_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/settings_repository/settings_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/cache_repository/cache_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/repositories/windows_repository/windows_repository.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/settings/settings.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/cache/cache.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/tab/tab.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/event/event.c src/main/background/c/core/data/models/window/window.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/cache_data_source/cache_data_source.c src/main/background/c/core/data/data_sources/settings_data_source/settings_data_source.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=10 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o src/main/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='[\"cwrap\"]' --js-library src/main/background/js/Library.js
scripts.build:dev: del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp && make-dir src/main/background/.tmp && npm run _build_c:dev && rig src/main/background/js/Main.js > src/main/background/.tmp/background.js && NODE_ENV=development webpack && del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp
scripts.build:dist: del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp && make-dir src/main/background/.tmp && npm run _build_c:dist && rig src/main/background/js/Main.js > src/main/background/.tmp/background.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp
